products.name: Elite Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Experience unparalleled audio clarity and silence with the Elite Noise-Cancelling Headphones. Perfect for travel, work, or just escaping the world. Featuring advanced active noise cancellation, comfortable earcups, and long-lasting battery life.
pros: Exceptional sound quality with deep bass
Extremely comfortable for long listening sessions
Intuitive controls and seamless Bluetooth pairing
cons: Premium price point might not suit all budgets
Can feel slightly bulky for very small heads
Lacks full waterproof rating (splash resistant only)

faq.question: Are these headphones wireless?
faq.answer: Yes, they are Bluetooth enabled and also come with an audio cable for wired listening.

faq.question: What is the battery life?
faq.answer: You can get up to 30 hours of listening with Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) enabled, and even longer without ANC.

faq.question: Are they comfortable for long flights?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Designed with plush earcups and a lightweight frame, they are ideal for extended wear during travel.

products.name: Compact Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Don't let its size fool you! This compact Bluetooth speaker delivers surprisingly powerful and clear sound, perfect for outdoor adventures or enhancing your home audio. Waterproof and durable.
pros: Incredible sound quality for its size
cons: Bass can be limited at very high volumes in large spaces
No built-in voice assistant (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant)

products.name: Ultra-Compact Smart Earbuds
products.description: Experience true wireless freedom with these ultra-compact smart earbuds. Featuring active noise cancellation, crystal-clear calls, and a comfortable fit for all-day wear.
pros: Compact charging case with long battery life
